means.word_mean: 1. genus of monocotyledonous plants with curious woolly flowers on sturdy stems above a fan of sword-shaped leaves; includes kangaroo's paw and cat's paw and Australian sword lily; sometimes placed in family Amaryllidaceae

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
